moduleMetadataJson.name: Multi Manage Set Wallpaper
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will set the desktop wallpaper background on the specified session.
          The method of setting the wallpaper depends on the platform type.
author: timwr

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: WALLPAPER_FILE
options.description: The local wallpaper file to set on the remote session
